com.quinsoft.zeidon.standardoe

Interface JavaOeConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJavaOeConfiguration

    public interface JavaOeConfiguration
    Defines the configuration options for instantiating a JavaObjectEngine.
    Author:
    dg

      • getActivateThreadPool

        ExecutorService getActivateThreadPool()
        Returns the thread pool used for asynchronous activates.
        Returns:

      • getUuidGenerator

        UuidGenerator getUuidGenerator()
        Returns UUID generator. UUIDs are generated for many internal Zeidon objects so this should be fast.
        Returns:

      • getPersistentTaskCacheMap

        ConcurrentMap<String,Task> getPersistentTaskCacheMap()
        This is the map that stores persistent Zeidon tasks. It's only job is to prevent persistent tasks from being cleaned up. It may allow tasks to expire if configured to do so.
        Returns:

      • getJmxAppName

        String getJmxAppName()
        Specifies the app name for JMX object names that are created. This is intended to be used in environments that might have multiple ObjectEngines loaded, like Tomcat. Then each OE will have JMX objects created with a different name. A sample might be the context name in Tomcat (e.g. resteay-1.10.100).
        Returns:
